collection.name: QuickCredit
collection.description: A collection on quickcredit node express API

requests.tests:
tests["Body matches string"] = responseBody.has("Agriculture Loan");

tests["Successful POST request"] = responseCode.code === 201 || responseCode.code === 202;

responseCode.name: Created
responseCode.detail: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

headers.name: access-control-allow-origin
headers.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

headers.name: connection
headers.description: Options that are desired for the connection

headers.name: content-length
headers.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

headers.name: content-type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: etag
headers.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

headers.name: x-powered-by
headers.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)
